## DateTimePicker.setCssClasses() method

Sets css classes for picker, allowing to override defaults

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setCssClasses(cssClasses: TCssClasses): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cssClasses | TCssClasses | Css classes to be set for picker |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
